Function Documentation

int meas_generate_report ( meas_t **  mst,
int  parameters 
)

Generate report information.

NOTE1: The new report will replace any previous report generated. NOTE2: This function will just generate the report, use meas_show_report to print it.

Parameters:
mst The meas user structure.
parameters Parameters of report (REPORT_TIMERS, REPORT_COUNTERS or REPORT_SHOW_ALL).
Returns:
FALSE on error, TRUE otherwise.
